Framework
Interface IRenderableFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
RenderableFactory
public interface IRenderableFactory

IRenderableFactory: implementations create displayable tokens.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Marc Price

Method Summary
abstract  IRenderable createRenderable(String model, String texture, double[] posn, double[] angle, double scale)
          Create and return new IRenderable instance.
 

Method Detail

createRenderable

IRenderable createRenderable(String model,
                             String texture,
                             double[] posn,
                             double[] angle,
                             double scale)
Create and return new IRenderable instance.

Parameters:
model - specifies the 3D model to be used
texture - specifies the texture to be used
posn - a double[3] that gives the x,y,z location coords
angle - a double[3] that gives the orientation about the x,y,z axes
scale - a double that specifies the scale-factor (between 0.0 and 1.0)
